name: Diagram: Dendro Treasure Compass
desc: A detailed step-by-step diagram for making a Dendro Treasure Compass. Use it to easily locate treasure all over Sumeru.

value.text: Learn to forge Dendro Treasure Compass.

value.name: Dendro Treasure Compass
value.desc:
A compass that can be used in Sumeru to search for nearby chests.

For some people, the significance of life lies in exploration and discovery. Upon reaching each destination, there is always bountiful treasure awaiting.

customize.name: Diagram: Dendro Treasure Compass
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step diagram for making a Dendro Treasure Compass. Use it to easily locate treasure all over Sumeru.

A compass that can be used in Sumeru to search for nearby chests.

For some people, the significance of life lies in exploration and discovery. Upon reaching each destination, there is always bountiful treasure awaiting.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Golden Raven Insignia
customize.desc: A raven insignia that symbolizes the pride and the guiding principle of the Treasure Hoarders. Whether it's hidden amidst the vastness of the land or in the depths of the seas, as long as there are treasures to be hunted down, the spirit of Treasure Hoarders, who will stop at nothing to acquire them, will never die.

customize.name: Padisarah
customize.desc: A holy and noble plant. The conditions for growth in its environment are very demanding. The flower buds can be processed to make valuable spices.

customize.name: Crystal Chunk
customize.desc: An uncut crystal. Only professional craftsmanship can bring out its true value.
